name: Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies
author: Jess
summary: Cookies with pudding mix and chocolate chips. This recipe bakes up to be soft and delicious.
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine shortening, sugars, milk, and vanilla extract in a large bowl
Whip mixture until light and fluffy
Combine flour, pudding mix, salt, and baking soda in a separate bowl
Pour over the shortening mixture and beat until well blended
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of cookie dough onto ungreased cookie sheets, spacing them 3 inches apart
Bake in the preheated oven, 1 cookie sheet at a time, until edges are set, 11 to 15 minutes
Cool each batch for 5 minutes before moving cookies onto a cooling rack
